notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by financial aid provided by FAPESP (2005/51850-9 and 2014/50316-7), CNPq (Edital MCT/CNPq, Universal B), CAPES for a PVNS fellowship for L.E.S.B. and a MSc scholarship for D.R.A., the US National Science Foundation (DEB-1142075), and start-up funds to E.J.T. provided by the University of Cincinnati.
